article: Do you like junk food? Do you enjoy eating hamburgers, hot dogs, French fries and chips? Do you like soft drinks, candy and ice cream ?If your answers are "Yes", you 'd better  be careful  .Most of them are junk food . Junk food has lots of fat ,salt and sugar ,  _  few nutrients .Most scientists say junk food is  _  .Our body changes sugar into fat .  I f  you have 3 spoonfuls of sugar each day ,how much sugar would you have eaten by the time you are 50?It will be 280 kilograms ! About 5 times as heavy as  your weight  ! Junk food has been  _  in the world for many years .Why? Firstly, it is  _  to make .It doesn't take much money to  make  junk food .Secondly ,it is quick and easy for people to have .Thirdly many people ,including children ,like it  _  it tastes good .Lastly ,most junk food has food additives .So it  _  and tastes better ,and can be kept for a long time . Junk food is bad for health ,  _  for children .It is the cause of over-weight heart diseases and many other health  _  .When children start eating lots of junk food ,they will not have enough milk and healthy fruit juice .This can cause a lack of calcium in their body .But it's OK to have junk food  sometimes  .it depends on your weight ,age and activities .If you are over-weight and want to lose weight ,you should eat as little junk food  as possible  . Junk food still have some nutrients and is a small part of a  _  diet .So you should eat about 95%of healthy food ,and then eat 5%of junk food .
